title: When someone is cold and unfeeling
context: Point out that a person is acting without emotion or sympathy.

content.bestLine: You seem really cold about this, what's going on?

neutral.text: I sense a lack of empathy
You seem detached from the situation
I'm not getting much emotional response from you
You're coming across as quite aloof
I'm trying to understand your emotional stance
You seem to be holding back your feelings
I'm not sure how you feel about this

informal.text: You're not exactly overflowing with emotion
What's wrong, you seem really distant
You're not really reacting to this, are you?
You seem kinda numb to the whole thing
I'm getting a major chill from you
You're not exactly warm and fuzzy about this
What's going on, you seem really unfeeling

sarcastic.text: Wow, you're so emotional about this
I can really feel the love and care from you
You're not cold at all, nope
I'm getting all the feels from you, said no one ever
You're the epitome of emotional intelligence
I'm so glad you're not being insensitive at all

rude.text: You don't care about anyone but yourself
You're not even human, you're so cold
